sense.def:
To be hopeful
pomeni imeti precejšnje zaupanje, da se bo zgodilo tisto, kar si želimo.

seg.quote: He sounded hopeful that she would come.

sense.def:
A hopeful outcome, method, or event
je izid, metoda ali dogodek, ki nam da občutek, da se bo zgodilo tisto, kar si želimo.

seg.quote: This seems to be a hopeful way of tacking the problem.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekdo
hopeful
, ima ambicije in čisto mogoče je, da jih bo izpolnil.

seg.quote: Almost a hundred hopefuls stood in a queue outside the theatre.
